name: Drunken Soldier
description:
My first attempt with tile mapping and level design. Second ever game. Second ever game jam.

Comment if you find any bugs.

1 Known bug is that if you dash into a wall you will get stuck, if that happens just hit the r button sorry.

Assets I used:
